cloak red yarn make 1 row instruction additional comment number cast on 90 stitches this may seem like an excessive amount of stitches but hornet s cape is very flowy so it needs to be this large and later cinched by a drawstring to get that effect if casting on this many stitches is difficult you can halve the number and make this piece twice then seam the two together 1 *k p* this is 1x1 ribbing so if you re modifying the pattern to make it larger make sure you cast on an even number of stitches to retain the ribbing pattern original credit cryptious on ravelry and
